Decatur Supper Club
Home About

Welcome to the Decatur Supper Club!

Join us each month for a potluck-style gathering of friends, new and old, from Decatur, GA and the surrounding area. It's free to join, and we welcome people from all walks of life.
Sign up

Why a Supper Club?

Nothing brings people together like good food. And bringing people together is exactly what we intend to do.

Fighting the loneliness epidemic

At a time when we're simultaneously more connected yet lonelier and more isolated than ever, sharing a meal that you helped prepare with friends and strangers alike is a revolutionary act.

Overcoming obstacles to community-building

From suburban sprawl pushing us further away from friends and family to a serious lack of third spaces, it sometimes feels like this place wasn't designed for humans. DSC members host dinner parties at their homes to make it easier to spend quality time without having to spend a lot of money or drive all over Metro Atlanta.

Making it easier to meet new people

Whether you're trying to make new friends after graduating from college, moving to a new city, becoming a parent, finding your balance as an empty-nester, or anything else, DSC dinner parties make meeting new friends fun and accessible.
Want to learn more? Visit our About page.

How It Works

1. Sign up

Click the sign up button at the top of this page and fill out the form that opens in a pop-up window. If the window doesn't appear, make sure you have pop-ups enabled on your web browser for this site.

2. RSVP to a dinner party

We host dinner parties once a month at one of our member's homes. Keep an eye out for an email with the subject line "Decatur Supper Club" for details on our next meetup.

3. Bring a dish and have fun!

We'll send out a spreadsheet before the dinner party where people can put down what they're bringing. Got food allergies? No problem! We'll make sure everyone is aware of what food allergies or dietary restrictions to be mindful of for the dinner party in question.

Dinner Party Calendar

View upcoming and past dinner parties from the Decatur Supper Club. Sign up to join our next dinner party!
